About Me

My name is Lee Kiernan and I am an experienced and freelance web developer, specialising in Ruby on Rails for the past 2 years. I have a passion for knowledge and technology. Check out some of the links below to see what I've been up to lately.

Skills

I have an expanding skill-set with focus on emerging open source projects. My introduction to development came from early attempts to build fan web pages, as well as a long spell as a developer in an online gaming environment. These skills have allowed for me to transition from hobbyist to creating professional pages and applications.

In summary!

I spend much of my time on a motorcycle, in the kitchen or planted firmly in front of a computer. A qualified personal trainer with a strong interest in nutrition, a scholarly approach to self improvement and an eager thirst for technology. I am also interested in giving back to those in need where I can.
